snippet: Arvind Kejriwal has become an unlikely bomb thrower in Indian politics. His solution to corruption? The formation of a new political party, in time for national elections in 2014.
abstract: Saturday Profile of Arvind Kejriwal, Indian social activist who is shaking India's political establishment with his anticorruption movement.

byline.contributor: Hari Kumar contributed reporting from New Delhi.

lead_paragraph: Arvind Kejriwal has become an unlikely bomb thrower in Indian politics. His solution to corruption? The formation of a new political party, in time for national elections in 2014.

headline.seo: Arvind Kejriwal Stirs the Pot and Strikes Fear in India
headline.main: Stirring the Pot and Striking Fear in India
headline.print_headline: Stirring the Pot and Striking Fear in India
